jsx.http.rpc.server
Class ServerReflector

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.http.rpc.HttpRemote
          jsx.http.rpc.XMLHttpRemote
              jsx.http.rpc.remote.Remote
                  jsx.http.rpc.remote.RemoteReflector
                      jsx.http.rpc.server.ServerReflector

public class ServerReflector
extends RemoteReflector

A base class of the server-side providers for remote reflect services.

Note that a server-side provider for remote reflect services is also a Remote object.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

isReflector

public boolean isReflector()

Checks if the servicing remote object IS a reflector.

Returns:
